text: “Kha ca hanhe xxk cak brrda xongkar khxng kha sung brrda phu thi ya so nı phændin doy mi bangkhwr læa mæwa phwk khea ca di hen sayyan thuk xyang phwk khea k ca mi sraththa tx sayyan nan læa hak phwk khea hen thang hæng khwam thuk txng phwk khea k ca mi thux man pen thang læa hak phwk khea hen thang hæng khwam phid phwk khea k yudthux man pen thang nan k pheraawa phwk khea ptiseth brrda xongkar khxng rea læa phwk khea cung di pen phu laley xongkar hela nan”
